Required.description: Require a package that is not imported by your code.

Ignored.description: Ignore a package, it is not used to calculate dependencies and is not vendored. Wildcards are supported, for example github.com/example/pkg/*

Constraint.description: Use a specific branch, version range, revision or alternate source for a project. Only applies to required and imported projects.

Override.description:
Use a specific branch, version range, revision or alternate source for a project.

WARNING: Overrides only affect YOUR vendor directory, dep ignores overrides for consumers of your library.

Global Metadata.description: Define global key-value pairs that are not used by dep, and are intended for use by other tools that read the dep configuration file.

Project Metadata.description: Define constraint-level key-value pairs that are not used by dep, and are intended for use by other tools that read the dep configuration file. Must be defined within a [[constraint]] stanza.
